name: Steve contra o Desperdício
description:
Joga como Steve e luta contra o desperdício e gula do Rei! Invade o seu castelo sem seres visto e arranja comida suficiente para salvar a tua aldeia! 

Play as Steve in the fight against the King's food waste and greedenes! Invade his castle without being seen and collect the food to save your starving village!

Project by:

  • André Borges;
  • Gonçalo Peres;
  • Pedro Sabrosa;
  • João Ponce;
